description: [MOVED] This preset has been relocated to 'security/base.json'. It is now an alias that
extends the new location to preserve backwards compatibility
prBodyNotes:
---
> [!WARNING]
> #### Moved preset: `Kong/public-shared-renovate:security-base`
>
> Your config references a deprecated preset. To prevent disruption, this file temporarily aliases to `Kong/public-shared-renovate//security/base`.
>
> #### Action required
>
> Update your Renovate config to extend directly from `Kong/public-shared-renovate//security/base`
>
> #### Examples
>
> Before (any of the following):
>
> ```json
> [
>   { "extends": ["Kong/public-shared-renovate:security-base"] },
>   { "extends": ["Kong/public-shared-renovate:security-base.json"] },
>   { "extends": ["local>Kong/public-shared-renovate:security-base"] },
>   { "extends": ["github>Kong/public-shared-renovate:security-base"] }
> ]
> ```
>
> After:
>
> ```json
> { "extends": ["Kong/public-shared-renovate//security/base"] }
> ```
>
> #### Timeline
>
> This alias will be removed in **January 2026**.
